mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USR_NM, USR_EMAIL, USR_GNDR, USR_NNM, USR_PW, USR_BRTH, USR_RNK ) VALUES ( #{usrNm}, #{usrEmail}, #{usrGndr}, #{usrNnm}, #{usrPw}, #{usrBrth}, #{usrRnk} )
mapper.select: SELECT USR_ID, USR_NM, USR_EMAIL, USR_GNDR, USR_NNM, USR_PW, USR_BRTH, USR_RNK FROM TB_USER WHERE USR_EMAIL = #{usrEmail}
